list.description: Select all the datacenters that contain the ONTAP clusters acting as source for SnapMirror relationships.
list.name: Datacenter

list.definition: query_result(snapmirror_labels{system_type!="7mode"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, source_cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace( label_replace( volume_labels{system_type!="7mode",datacenter=~"$Datacenter"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)"), "source_cluster", "$1", "cluster", "(.*)"))
list.name: Cluster

query.query: query_result(snapmirror_labels{system_type!="7mode"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, source_cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace( label_replace( volume_labels{system_type!="7mode",datacenter=~"$Datacenter"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)"), "source_cluster", "$1", "cluster", "(.*)"))
